nodes.text: Rontl was a Human male miner who worked in the Damotit refinery, which processed the produce in the nearby mine, Damotite during the Clone Wars. In 21 BBY, Rontl and several workers remained behind and continued to work at the refinery when they were visited by Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, who had smuggled a false identity and warned them that the shields of the refinery were on the verge to collapse. Rontl and the workers complied to his advice and prepared to flee the building. However, the refinery was destroyed moments later Rontl and the others were able to escape the destruction.
